overview: A captain is promoted by his company from tramp steamers to their flagship passenger liner. Although he is a thoroughly competent sailor ready to take charge of such a ship, he is less prepared for the social duties his new position involves, not least the way he in which becomes the target for all the unattached women on board.
tagline: Another Hilarious Comedy From the Author of the Notorious "Doctor in the House" Series!
title: The Captain's Table
